name: electron-tracker-suite
author: Guan Xin Wang
description: An Electron application built with various frameworks

scripts.dev-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- nx serve nest-backend --watch
scripts.dev-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- nx serve express-backend --watch
scripts.dev-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- nx serve spring-backend
scripts.prod-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- nx serve nest-backend --watch
scripts.build-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- nx build nest-backend
scripts.build-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- nx build express-backend
scripts.build-prod-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- nx build nest-backend
scripts.build-prod-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- nx build express-backend
scripts.build-prod-profile: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- node --loader ts-node/esm tools/build-profile.ts
scripts.dev-electron-ng: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-nest "pnpm -s run build-ng && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-vue: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-nest "pnpm -s run build-vue && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-react: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-nest "pnpm -s run build-react && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-ng-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=ng-spring "pnpm -s run build-ng && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-vue-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=vue-spring "pnpm -s run build-vue && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.dev-electron-react-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile dev -- cross-env-shell APP_PROFILE=react-spring "pnpm -s run build-react && pnpm run build-spring && electron-forge start"
scripts.make: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:profile: pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:profile: pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:ng-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:ng-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:ng-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:ng-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:ng-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:ng-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:vue-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:vue-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:vue-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:vue-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:vue-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:vue-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:react-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:react-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:react-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:react-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.make:react-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run forge:make
scripts.package:react-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run forge:package
scripts.publish-local: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run forge:publish -- --from-dry-run
scripts.publish-dry: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run forge:publish -- --dry-run
scripts.publish: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:ng-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-nest pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:ng-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-express pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:vue-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-nest pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:vue-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-express pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:react-nest: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-nest pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:react-express: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-express pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:ng-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=ng-spring pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:vue-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=vue-spring pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:react-spring: pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run build:profile && pnpm -s run with-env --profile prod -- cross-env APP_PROFILE=react-spring pnpm -s run forge:publish
scripts.publish:all-node: pnpm -s run publish:ng-nest && pnpm -s run publish:ng-express && pnpm -s run publish:vue-nest && pnpm -s run publish:vue-express && pnpm -s run publish:react-nest && pnpm -s run publish:react-express
scripts.publish:all: pnpm -s run publish:all-node && pnpm -s run publish:ng-spring && pnpm -s run publish:vue-spring && pnpm -s run publish:react-spring
